value.original: A_Asset A_Asset LEFT OUTER JOIN M_Product M_Product ON A_Asset.M_Product_ID=M_Product.M_Product_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN C_BPartner C_BPartner ON A_Asset.C_BPartner_ID=C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_User AD_User ON A_Asset.AD_User_ID=AD_User.AD_User_ID

value.original: Generate Work Operation Requirements window. Enables you to generate component issues, component returns and resource usage transactions for multiple operations across work orders.

M_MovementLine LINE INNER JOIN M_Movement HEAD ON(head.M_Movement_ID=line.M_Movement_ID AND head.DocStatus='IP') LEFT JOIN M_Product P ON (LINE.M_Product_ID=P.M_Product_ID) LEFT JOIN M_Warehouse W ON (HEAD.M_Warehouse_ID=W.M_Warehouse_ID) LEFT JOIN M_Locator LOC ON(LINE.M_Locator_ID=LOC.M_Locator_ID) LEFT JOIN M_Locator LOC2 ON(LINE.M_LocatorTo_ID=LOC2.M_Locator_ID) WHERE LINE.M_MovementLine_ID NOT IN(SELECT M_MovementLine_ID FROM M_PackageLine where dtd001_totalqty=dtd001_alreadypackqty+qty AND M_MovementLine_ID is not null)
